alert.note: Alert for Santa Susana Mountains; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 27 at 2:09PM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM Saturday to 10 PM PDT Monday. Strongest Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Santa Susana Mountains; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
